commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission list
commands.summary: List the submissions of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission list --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission list --offer-id MyOfferId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission publish
commands.summary: Publish the submissions of a marketplace offer.
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission publish --offer-id MyOfferId  --submission-id 11521167929065 --target draft
az partnercenter marketplace offer submission publish --offer-id MyOfferId  --submission-id 11521167929065 --target preview
az partnercenter marketplace offer submission publish --offer-id MyOfferId  --submission-id 11521167929065 --target live

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission show
commands.summary: Get the submission of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer submission show --offer-id
                                                   --submission-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer submission show --offer-id MyOfferId --submission-id 11521167929065
